title: Soukou Kijo Iris
synopsis: In the distant future, mankind has left Earth to reside among the vast reaches of space, joining the interspecies collective known as the Space Federation. Following this development, the Soviet Security Force (SSF) was formed to establish humanity's presence throughout the galaxy. Among the SSF's many divisions is the Special Armored Company (SAC) #101. Using powerful mobile humanoid weapons called "Armored Knights," these female enforcers dispense justice upon corrupt officials, crime lords, and other villainous forces threatening public order.
staff: [['Yoshida, Tomohiro', ['Sound Director']], ['Yakushi, Ruri', ['Theme Song Composition', ' Theme Song Performance', ' Theme Song Lyrics']], ['Lilith Soft', ['Original Creator']], ['Nakayama, Atsushi', ['Director of Photography']]]
